name: Time Equestrians: The Origin
description:
This is an intro to the story of epic adventures where time travel and superpowers merge to create a wide variety of special skills.

Some use them to help people, while others turn them into deadly weapons, able to crash the timeline of the universe and put an end to everything.

But under all the glamour and blood, heroes are people. And humans enjoy simple things like walking on the Sunday morning, a quick stroll by the seaside, a cup of tea with some sweets... This game is about those things.

Do not worry though, the adventures are yet to come!

Made by

Jahan Atlas: instagram.com/jhn.atlas

Devin Katz: twitter.com/devinisntkatz
